text:
Hello everyone!
Do any of you know how to use the options "bold - italic - underline" with the field type "font_field"?
Thanks !
```{
            "name": "font_field",
            "label": "font_field",
            "required": false,
            "locked": false,
            "inline_help_text": "",
            "help_text": "",
            "load_external_fonts": true,
            "type": "font",
            "default": {
              "size": 20,
              "font":"Montserrat",
              "font_set":"GOOGLE",
              "size_unit": "px",
              "color": "#666666",
              "styles": {
